mobile_phone

a_1566565461440.text:
Complete this form to initiate a new proposal by FTD Solutions team.  

Required input is highlighted in blue text.

a_1534513292030.text: Indicate whether the new project is with either an existing client (company) or new client.

a_1534513325977.text:
Select the contact within the existing client (company) from the search box below.  

If this is a new contact within an existing client (company) select the "New Client Contact" check box to enter the new contact information to whom the proposal shall be sent.

existing_client_contact_name_select_name.label: Existing Client Contact Name (Select name to whom the proposal should be sent)

existing_client_company_zip_or_country_c.label: Existing Client Company Zip or Country Code

a_1534513425214.text: Select the name of the existing client (company) that the new contact is associated with.

existing_client_zip_or_country_code.label: Existing Client Zip or Country Code

existing_client_airport_code_3_letters_o.label: Existing Client Airport Code (3 Letters Only)

a_1534513462686.text: Enter all available information for the new contact.  The minimum required is First Name, Last Name, and Email Address.

a_1560293505365.text:
Add additional project stakeholders here.

Include name, role, and email address.

a_tmp-1151026567087.text: Select the project phase / category of project that will be performed.

a_tmp-6605195938163.text:
Clearly describe the problem to be solved, root cause and any other background information and client notes.  Attach any useful reference material.  

Useful reference material typically includes drawings, photos, equipment datasheets, and/or operational data such as flow, temperature, pressure or stream chemical analysis results.

a_tmp-1106080357967.text: Select the primary project driver. If the primary project driver is not listed, select other and describe the primary project driver.

a_tmp-2347051582014.text: Select recommended proposal writer (typically PM for the client or manager with the project specific expertise).

a_tmp-4569182845903.text:
Enter any relevant project information in the table below. 

Feel free to add additional parameters to the table as needed as well as additional rows. The value field can contain text and/or units. Attach as much available reference information as is available from client.

Grid table error means the table has been removed temporarily. Use the image below as a guide when inputting information.

a_1566569506048.text: Indicate if field work will be required to perform this scope and describe the field scope in the space provided.

a_tmp-6115798104768.text:
Describe the preferred solution.  The solution description should include enough detail such that an independent party can fully understand the concept of the solution. 

If there is no preferred solution, then this project shall start at the study phase and enter N/A here.

a_tmp-9395092837321.text: Select all relevenat project deliverables from the list for this project.  If others are requested, add them via the section below.

a_1566569375817.text: List any other specific deliverables requested by the client.

a_1557767396818.text: Describe the detailed design scope.  The description should include enough detail such that an independent party can fully understand the concept of the solution.

a_1557767439916.text: Select the detailed design progress that this project should complete.

a_1557767507741.text: Attach relevent detailed design scope sketch(es) and PFD(s).

a_1557767550255.text: Select all appropriate detailed design disciplines which are part of the project.

client_requested_life_safety_design_deli.label: Client Requested Life Safety Design Deliverables

a_1557767659411.text: Describe the technology development project scope in detail.

a_1557767689556.text: Select all requested technology design services.  If others are requested, add them via the section below.

a_1557767716821.text: Select which phase of the typical site water model project will be completed as part of this proposal.

item.label: Phase 2: New Model Scenarios, Roadmap, & Base Version Enhancement
item.value: Phase 2: New Model Scenarios, Roadmap, & Base Version Enhancement

a_1557767755289.text: Describe the clients purpose for the site water model.

a_1557767789664.text: Did FTD developed the detailed design project scope?

a_1557767918732.text: Should FTD attend weekly project work group meetings?

a_1557767942289.text: If construction budget is known, enter here  in US dollars ($).

a_1557767981269.text: How many design review meetings will there be (enter number)?

a_1557768006523.text: What is the design schedule (enter number of weeks)?

a_1557768030791.text: Select all appropriate disciplines for which SDD services are requested

a_1557768126144.text: If construction budget is known, enter here  in US dollars ($).

a_1557768133215.text: Should FTD attend weekly project work group meetings?

a_1557768155291.text: In addition to weekly work group meetings, how many meetings should FTD attend (enter number)?

number_of_meetings_outside_of_weekly_wg_.label: Number of Meetings (outside of weekly WG meetings) to attend?

a_1557768221449.text: What is the construction schedule (enter number of weeks)?

a_1557768243184.text: Select all appropriate disciplines for which SDC services are requested

item.label: Submittal review from conceptual or process perspective
item.value: Submittal review from conceptual or process perspective

a_1557768345197.text: Should FTD attend weekly project work group meetings?

a_1557768397785.text: Select who will be performing the commissioning.

a_1557768365043.text: If construction budget is known, enter here  in US dollars ($).

a_1557768385786.text: In addition to weekly work group meetings, how many meetings should FTD attend (enter number)?

number_of_meetings_outside_of_weekly_wg_.label: Number of Meetings (outside of weekly WG meetings) to attend (2)?

a_1557768400686.text: What is the commissioning schedule (enter number of weeks)?

item.label: Review and comment on commissioning plan
item.value: Review and comment on commissioning plan

item.label: Respond to questions from commissioning agent
item.value: Respond to questions from commissioning agent

a_1561147603582.text: Select the type of sampling and analysis that is being requested to be performed.

a_1561474679312.text: Check this box if the sampling and analysis will be a blanket contract (Enter the $ value of the blanket contract in the Approved Budget section below).

a_1561575661721.text: Complete table below if specific testing will be performed.  Include the type of test to be performed, water type, and quantity for each test.

a_1561575776193.text: Check this box if the sampling and analysis will be a blanket contract (Enter the $ value of the blanket contract in the Approved Budget section below).

a_1561575782875.text: Complete table below if specific testing will be performed.  Include the type of test to be performed, water type, and quantity for each test.

a_1561575792261.text: Check this box if the sampling and analysis will be a blanket contract (Enter the $ value of the blanket contract in the Approved Budget section below).

a_1561575798500.text: Complete table below if specific testing will be performed.  Include the type of test to be performed, water type, and quantity for each test.

a_1561575806840.text: Check this box if the sampling and analysis will be a blanket contract (Enter the $ value of the blanket contract in the Approved Budget section below).

a_1561575810191.text: Complete table below if specific testing will be performed.  Include the type of test to be performed, water type, and quantity for each test.

a_tmp-7184324659286.text: Select if this project has been approved for execution by client management (above system owner/engineer level).

a_1566564916734.text:
A conversation with client manager, whom will be approving proposal, regarding budget constraints shall be documented here prior to starting proposal.  

Projects that originate from FTD involvement with operations require a detailed understanding of client budget constraints and capabilities as this will affect FTD's project approach.

a_tmp-6236371067532.text:
Are there any project financial boundaries that FTD Solutions should be aware of?  Please provide boundaries in dollars ($) to inform fee development.

In project budget/financial justification notes provide any other useful project financial information such as construction budget, recurring cost to client, financial exposure, possible cost savings, etc.

a_tmp-0575142164061.text: What is the requested due date for the proposal? If the proposal is urgent, please select.

a_tmp-4962478959686.text: What is the projected project start date?

a_tmp-9699152313799.text: What is the requested project completion date?

a_1534513658541.text:
Enter Draft Project Title

Naming Convention: Fab System Name (with nouns...Study, Upgrade, Reduction, Optimization, Replacement)

a_1559080497793.text:
Add new proposal to scorecard.  

Training here.

a_1547649302054.text: Select the below option only if the proposal has been prepared, reviewed, and approved outside of Integrify.

proposal_ready_to_submit_to_client.label: Proposal Ready to Submit to Client

item.label: Proposal Complete and Ready to Submit to Client
item.value: Proposal Complete and Ready to Submit to Client
